title: Authors and Citation
text: Schwab E, Chhugani K, Al Nahid , Mangul S (2024). reTCR: TCR Repertoire Analysis R. R package version 0.0.0.90, https://mangul-lab-usc.github.io/reTCR, https://github.com/Mangul-Lab-USC/reTCR.
code: @Manual{,   title = {reTCR: TCR Repertoire Analysis in R},   author = {Ella Maria Schwab and Karishma Chhugani and Abdullah {Al Nahid} and Serghei Mangul},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.90, https://mangul-lab-usc.github.io/reTCR},   url = {https://github.com/Mangul-Lab-USC/reTCR}, }

title: TCR Repertoire Analysis in R
code: library(reTCR)  proj <- reTCR::get_study(id = "PRJNA473147")  # view data print(proj@data)

title: TCR Repertoire Analysis in R
code: # summary data print(proj@basic@summary_data)  # reads count print(proj@basic@reads_count)  # clonotype count print(proj@basic@clonotype_count)  # mean frequency print(proj@basic@mean_freq)  # geometric mean of clonotype frequency print(proj@basic@geomean_freq)  # mean length of CDR3 nucleotide sequence print(proj@basic@mean_cdr3nt_len)  # convergence print(proj@basic@convergence)  # spectratype print(proj@basic@spectratype)

title: TCR Repertoire Analysis in R
text: D’Agostino normality test clonotype count Shapiro-Wilk normality test clonotype count

title: Class
text: summary_data summary data reads_count read counts clonotype_count clonotype count mean_freq mean frequency geomean_freq geometric mean clonotype frequency mean_cdr3nt_len mean CDR3 nucleotide length convergence mean unique CDR3 count sample spectratype spectratype data

title: Class
text: shannon_index numeric value representing Shannon index. gini_index numeric value representing Gini index.

title: Class
text: aa_spectratype aa spectratype data. aa_max_spectratype aa max spectratype data. aa_motif_count aa motif count data.

title: Plot Motif Counts — plot_motif_counts
text: data data frame containing motif counts. threshold minimum count threshold (default: 60).

title: Plot Motif Counts — plot_motif_counts
text: ggplot2 object representing motif counts plot.

title: Class
text: data contains main data project. basic contains basic analysis information.
